title: Chicken kebabs with chilli dipping sauce
ingredients: ['Chicken kebabs', '1 tbsp balsamic vinegar', '1 tsp soy sauce', '3 tbsp vegetable oil', '1 garlic clove, crushed', 'finely grated zest and juice of 1 lime', '4 chicken breast fillets, about 600g in total, cubed', 'lime wedges to garnish (optional)', 'Chilli dipping sauce', '50g caster sugar', '90ml white wine or rice vinegar', '1 tsp crushed dried chillies']
